title: Precise defintion of limits
text: The general form is $$-\delta<x-a<0$$, which we can manipulate into $$a-\delta<x<a$$ to fit our statement above, where a is what $$x$$ approaches.
speech: The general form is  minus delta is less than x minus a, is less than, 0 , which we can manipulate into  a, minus delta is less than x is less than a  to fit our statement above, where a is what  x  approaches.
